name: Hackathon Board Frontend
description: This is a hackathon board frontend which connects to urban-spoon(the backend)

name: Hackathon Board Backend
description: This is the Hackathon backend its build on Payload CMS. This backend is for the admin and for handing user requests. Users can either query using graphql or rest API

name: Heyoo
description: heyooh is a javascript port of heyoo(made in python). Heyoo is a python wrapper for the Whatsapp Cloud API
